description: Command to update one or multiple properties of an existing contact handle.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Set to 1 to disclose (publish) the contact details, set to 0 for non-disclosure. This feature is only supported by dedicated registries and by the HEXONET whois server

Specify which dedicated contact details should be affected by the DISCLOSE parameter setting. If not stated the DISCLOSE parameter affects all possible contact details. Multiple values are possible and have to be separated by a blank space. Possible values are:NAME: disclose the nameORG: disclose the organization nameADDR: disclose street, state, zip, city and countryVOICE: disclose the phone numberFAX: disclose the fax numberEMAIL: disclose the email address
If set to 1 the contact details will get disclosed for domains registered at AFNIC
Email address of the sponsoring contact
Set to 1 to disclose (publish) the contact details, set to 0 for non-disclosure. This feature is only supported by CZ.Nic

Specify which dedicated contact details should be affected by the DISCLOSE parameter setting. If not stated the DISCLOSE parameter affects all possible contact details. Multiple values are possible and have to be separated by a blank space. Possible values are:ADDR: disclose street, state, zip, city and countryVOICE: disclose the phone numberFAX: disclose the fax numberEMAIL: disclose the email addressVAT: disclose the VATIDENT: disclose the IDENTNOTIFYEMAIL: disclose the notification email address
